title: Upgraded to version 104.0.1, now Google search scrolls instead of showing pages
content:
After I upgraded to the most recent version 104.0.1 on my desktop, Google search results infinitely scroll instead of breaking up into pages. I haven't changed anything else, didn't add any new Add-ons, etc.

What could be causing this? I tried altering every setting on the Google Search site, but it keeps happening. Is there a way to revert to an older version?
creator: invisiblejungle

title: removing stubborn tiles from firefox
content: I have quite a few tiles on firefox I can not delete. They will sometime move around the page but will not go away. I switched to firefox recently because of IE going away and have been trying for several months with no results. I'm not sure what the boxes on the home screen are called but hope someone understands what I mean.

title: difficulties opening software
content: I can't get https://currently.att.yahoo.com to sign in. It is where I get my emails but when I sign in it times out and says "make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the web." I have a ticket number 71598 but it did not give me any info about what I need to do for the software problem. If I try to open currently.att.yahoo.com in Egde it says it can't reach the page oidc.idp.clogin.att.com AT&T says there is no problem with the DSL. Network diagnostics did not find a problem. Thankyou Cathy

title: Microsoft Family Features
content:
I recently got an HP laptop for college and it came in the mail today and in one of my classes our professor requires us to use only firefox for his class and since i got my laptop today i had to set up everything and i had firefox up and running for a hours but now it keeps saying You can't use Mozilla Firefox because of your family safety settings, but it doesn't hurt to ask and whenever i click to ask it doesnt help and i really need this figured out before tuesday
